text:
Union Health Ministry reported 580 cases of adverse reaction after administering 3.8 lakh health workers with #CoronavirusVaccine on day-3 of #VaccinationDrive in #India
2 deaths have been reported from #UP & #Karnataka after inoculation.
#Corona #COVID19 #PfizerBioNTech #vaccine https://t.co/KiZC5WwUiA
